cells.data:
1. If you don’t have it, clone the https://github.com/BrightcoveLearning/Brightcove-Player-api-docs repo
  2. If you do have the repo, be sure to sync first
  3. Switch to the gh-pages branch — this is the only branch we use, so don’t ever leave it (it’s the default for the repo)
  4. Open Terminal and navigate to the top level directory of your local copy
  5. Run => bash generate-docs.sh
  6. The script runs grunt, and then copies files to the correct location under Video Cloud and Perform docs
  7. You will see a bunch of XML validation issues regarding unclosed attributes and such, but ignore them - as long as grunt finishes, all should be well
  8. Commit changes to both:
    1. BCL-Developer-Docs
    2. Brightcove-Player-api-dos
